Key Match Events: David Fry blasted a two-run homer in the seventh inning
Jose Ramirez belted his first home run of the postseason in the fifth inning
Zach McKinstry tied the score at 2-2 in the bottom of the fifth inning with a solo home run
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Guardians earned their first playoff win when facing elimination since Game 6 of the 1997 World Series in Florida
The Guardians had dropped 11 consecutive postseason elimination games since then, the longest such losing streak in MLB history
Others: The winner will face either the New York Yankees or Kansas City Royals in the ALCS beginning Monday in a best-of-seven series
